Issue.creator: sykesm
Issue.summary: As a fabric operator, I want to be able to enable log records for each message that is exchanged over a gRPC stream. When a call terminates, I want the response code and duration of the request captured as well.
Issue.description: Fabric's API is primarily surfaced as gRPC services. Logging the completion of a request with the appropriate context can serve as an access log for gRPC. When detailed debug is required, message based logging for streaming APIs may be helpful.
